__e: Listen kiddies, everything you believe to be true is wrong, and trust us, because we've been here for almost an hour.
For the state and the law, the family and the Church, the lie and the fear.
Everything about you is a lie, and you expect me to tell the truth?
If I hadn't said what you call a "lie", which, after all, was not even a lie,..
If you tell everybody this lie, what'll happen to us?
I know this is all a lie. That it's no good. That it's a piece of shit...
You've lived a lie for so long you've convinced yourself it is true.
I can't find my car. You didn't run off with it, did you?
You and all the people like you, you can't keep a lie locked away forever.
